casebody.data:
Tara COOK-LITTMAN, et al.
v.
BOARD OF SELECTMEN OF the TOWN OF FAIRFIELD, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 2, 2017 James T. Baldwin, in support of the petition. Joel Z. Green, Linda Pesce Laske, William M. Burke and Robert T. Morrin, in opposition.

The petition by the defendants Board of Selectmen of the Town of Fairfield, Christopher W. Tymniak, Edward J. Bateson III, and the town of Fairfield for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 40309) is dismissed.
